evidence.claim: Ora Dental utilizes HIPAA compliance for data handling, ensuring patient information is securely managed according to federal regulations.
Ora Dental implements FHIR standards for health data interoperability, facilitating health information exchange.
HL7 standards are adhered to by Ora Dental for efficient medical data communication among various system components.
The company mentions using cloud solutions for scalability and security, primarily focusing on AWS.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of X12 transactions or health data exchange found.
